name: Karvaros Pre-Alpha Demo v2.0
description:
Karvaros is a adventure action game inspired by the Dark Souls games.  The world of Karvaros is envisioned in a fantasy comic being written by Alexander Murphy.  The atmosphere is within a massive, constantly growing reef. This reef is known as the continent Karvaros and is occupied by several factions, which are always in competition to be the mightiest. 

     The actual plot and setting of the game has been in development since 2021, but the project as a whole has been in development as a prototype since 2020. Currently, it is in production by two people; Dakota Zwahlen and Alexander Murphy, under Arctiform LLC. 

     This current content is a pre-alpha demo in the prototype stage. The hope is to test the mechanics of the game.
